JOB DESCRIPTION: Qualification: MCA, BE, B.Tech, BCA, M.Tech in computer science or similar relevant field   Job Description       We are looking for a Node.js Developer responsible for managing the interchange of data between the server and the users.      Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, definition and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end.      You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application.      Therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well.

EDUCATION.UG: BCA in Computers, B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial
EDUCATION.PG: MCA in Computers, M.Tech in Electronics/Telecommunication
